text: 18.17: Ro 16.17 naŋga, 1 Ko 5.9 naŋga, 5.13 naŋga, 6.1-6 naŋga, 2 Te 3.6 naŋga, 3.14Kamatɨna nurɨŋandɨ kuyu maŋindarɨtiŋgata, uta krunavundi Jisasɨrɨm indarɨmaŋgarandu ŋɨnɨŋ amba. Kamatɨna krunavundi Jisasɨrɨm indarɨmaŋgarandu haŋɨnɨŋ ndu kuyu ndahara maŋindarɨtiŋgata, nuŋ Gotɨŋ maŋgaha mɨŋga, naŋga kru gavaman ndamarɨm tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋamɨŋa mɨŋgaŋ ŋgɨmañandɨ.
